newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesian rupiah briefly hit by Suharto rumour.
newsitem.headline: Indonesian rupiah briefly hit by Suharto rumour.

text.p: The Indonesian rupiah was rattled again against the dollar on Thursday afternoon on rumours over President Suharto's health, dealers said.
They said market rumours that Suharto was admitted to hospital first emerged in Singapore and quickly spread to Indonesia, causing the rupiah to slip.
But the stock market shrugged off the rumours, which palace officials in Jakarta said were unfounded.
Spot rupiah fell to a low of 2,325.0 before recovered to 2,320.0/21.0 at 0845 GMT. It opened at 2,318.5/19.5.
